questionnaire.name: Tell us about bicycle parking in this area

sections.title: Tell us about bicycle parking in this area
sections.description:
Help us map the real parking conditions for cyclists in Rome: whether there are safe, public, informal or no options at all.

ðŸš² Learn more about theBIKEnet project

questions.text: Which best describes the parking situation here?

options.text: Secure paid parking (guarded, indoor, or monitored)
Secure public parking (free, racks or stands well located and visible)
Public parking (racks or stands, but not secure or overcrowded)

questions.text: How safe does it feel to leave a bicycle here for a while?

options.text: Very safe â€“ I would leave it even for hours
Moderately safe â€“ for a short stop
Unsafe â€“ I would not leave it unattended

questions.text: What would most improve bicycle parking in this area?

options.text: Install secure or monitored parking facilities
Add more public racks or stands
Free the space from obstacles or car parking
